summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue North, from a point 40 feet south of East Thomas Street to the south line of Coulter's Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 10443 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
